name: A N T
description:
YOU ARE AN ANT

W O R K

This is a short game based on the facebook group "A group where we all pretend to be ants in an ant colony"  https://www.facebook.com/groups/1416375691836223/

This game is free to download and I hope it can bring a little joy to your day.  If you like it please consider supporting my by checking out my other projects and  following my page to be informed about my future works.
